message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you a decent amount, but don't expect too much.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going easy on you yet.
I'm still willing to be generous, but I'm not going to give you all the power. Meet me in the middle?
I'm starting to think you're not serious about dividing the money fairly. Let's meet in the middle and be done with it.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about getting a good deal. Meet me at this compromise?
I'm not falling for your compromise. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think this is the end of the negotiation.
I'm starting to think you're not willing to make a serious offer. I'll give you a slight edge, but don't expect me to give away the farm.
I'm not going to give you the upper hand. I'll make a strong offer, and this time, it's final.
I'm not going to give you the upper hand, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't expect me to get any softer.
I'm not going to back down. This is my final offer, and I expect you to accept it.
I'm not going to give up yet. I'll make one last offer, and it's a good one. Take it or leave it.
Fine, it's your loss. I'll take the last 10000 and leave you with nothing. It's been a pleasure playing with you.
